meta.title: From ESA to DIVA
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: It's Eurovision week! Spain's entry is "Esa Diva", by artist Melody. Esa Diva translates to "That Diva" in English. [Here is Melody's live performance](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H46FB-rLh04) from the finals.

ladder.clue: Advance a letter in <> one spot in the alphabet to something you might find on a train ticket
Add a letter to the front of <> to get a (different) letter
<> {}, a very real phenomenon that does not give you superpowers
Mascot whose first name is officially <>
Word that follows <> in your kitchen, or on your board game table
Add a letter to <> to get a way to walk
Drop two letters in <> to get a kind of singer
